defaultHadith:
Ebû Hurairah radıyallahu anh said that he heard the Prophet (peace be upon him) saying:

“I swear, I ask God to forgive me and repent more than seventy times a day.”

Bukhari, Daavât 3. See also. Tirmidhi, Tafsir sura (47) Ibn Majah, Adab 57
